title: Serial Killers - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/13/18
itunes:title: Serial Killers - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/13/18
description:
George Noory and author Peter Vronsky examine the history of serial killers, statistics about the victims and frequency of their killings, and what police are doing to try to stop them.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
